channel.title: Esrie s Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Esrie s Blog

item.title: Init_1.asec
item.description: Control can sometimes be an illusion. But sometimes you need illusions to gain control. Fantasy is an easy way to give meaning to world. To cloak our harsh reality with escapist comfort. After all, isn’t that why we surround ourselves with so many screens? So we can avoid seeing? So we can avoid each other? So we can avoid truth.

Hi! i’m esrie. I’m a vulnerability researcher interested in systems and security. I started this blog to document my learning process, share personal research findings, thoughts, and random stuff. my interests include: Kernel exploitation Software Exploitation FOSS contact me at coven@tutanota.com
